modmenu.descriptionTranslation.yhs_fzh: A helper mod for function zombies.
fzh.enabled: Function Zombies Helper is enabled now.
fzh.disabled: Function Zombies Helper is disabled now.
fzh.tips.usingbetaversion.title: You're using BETA version of FZH!
fzh.tips.usingbetaversion.description: If you encounter any issues, report them to YHSabc233, thanks!
fzh.message.error: Error: Please type a valid %s value
fzh.message.unknown: §cUnknown command, please use '/fzh help' to get help.
fzh.message.help_2: §a/fzh set <ConfigItem> ：Modify an option in a config.
fzh.message.help_6: §e(You can also type '/fzh help <config>' to get help about config.)
fzh.message.help.set_1:
§aposition : If you only input the 'position' then will query current HPDP position. 
But if you add 'x y' §e(like '300 200') §abehind the 'position' then will change the HPDP position.
fzh.message.help.set_2: §amaxPlayersToShow : Set HPDP's max player show counts.
fzh.message.set.positionCustom: Position has been set to X: %d, Y: %d
fzh.message.set.textMargin.warn: Suggestion: Adjust the text spacing to 8 or above to avoid overlapping display.
fzh.screen.positionModify.title: Position Modify GUI
fzh.screen.config.title: FZH Config
